question: Dear sir please tell me the meaning of name eesha is it Islamic name.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
'Eeshas (Arabic) from the root word, 'Aish', meaning one greatly alive or to
remain alive.

Some close matches from the same root word are:
1. Aaisha (masc. Aaish) - name of the beloved wife of Nabi (Sallallaahu
Alayhi Wasallam) meaning one experiencing good conditions
2. Ayshaa (masc. Ayash) - superlative of the above

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
